name: Biowar 2
description:
The "apocalypse" that has been going before is still active. Zombies keep appearing and you must stop them. But in your way still appear the Bad Sin Training (BST) soldiers. They are after you, because you are wanted. "Kill them, Hellgunner."

Biowar 2 is a game about shooting zombies and other things.

Levels:

Drooling Valley

Guns Blazing

Out of Town

Pain Tracker

Bad Sin Territory

Badlands Moon
